show run command for Rule Ensure 'security-level' is set to '0' for Internet-facing interface

external_variable.comment: This variable is used in Rule Ensure 'security-level' is set to '0' for Internet-facing interface
This variable is used in Rule Ensure 'security-level' is set to '0' for Internet-facing interface

local_variable.comment: Regex for Rule Ensure Botnet protection is enabled for untrusted interfaces

external_variable.comment: This variable is used in Rule Ensure Botnet protection is enabled for untrusted interfaces
This variable is used in Rule Ensure ActiveX filtering is enabled
This variable is used in Rule Ensure Java applet filtering is enabled
This variable is used in Rule Ensure explicit deny in access lists is configured correctly
